column1: Share the details for your Garden to enable creating the NFT and smart account for the garden and the allow list of operators and gardeners. For the location of your garden please select one that can be managed by at most 20 gardeners and operators. Garden operators have the ability to approve work submitted by themselves or other gardeners

column2: Here in this garden we test things

column1: Provide the email address or phone number the operator or gardener will be logging in with. All operators are gardeners so no need to duplicate an entry in both list.
